com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue

Interface YFSGetSupplierExportInfoUE


  • public interface YFSGetSupplierExportInfoUE

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      YFSExtnSupplierExportOutputInfoStruct getSupplierExportInfo(YFSEnvironment env, YFSExtnSupplierExportInputInfoStruct inXML)
      This user exit is used to get item/consignee specific, supplier export information, such as supplier license number or tax payer Id, which are different for different criteria.

    • Method Detail

      • getSupplierExportInfo

        YFSExtnSupplierExportOutputInfoStruct getSupplierExportInfo(YFSEnvironment env,
                                                            YFSExtnSupplierExportInputInfoStruct inXML)
                                                     throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException
        This user exit is used to get item/consignee specific, supplier export information, such as supplier license number or tax payer Id, which are different for different criteria. For example during international shipments, the supplier license number might be different for different countries and for different items.

        To code custom user exits, implement the method in this interface. The system calls the methods in your class. If this method gives any exception, the current transaction is rolled back. If this user exit is not used to extend the logic, the following default logic is implemented:
        • The system will read YFS_SHIPNODE table to get the default supplier open license information.

        Pre-condition:
        This user exit is called only in the case of international shipments.

        Post-condition:
        YFS_EXTN_SUPPLIER_EXPORT_OUTPUT_INFO structure contains all the requested export details.

        Deprecated:
        This API is deprecated as of Sterling Supply Chain Applications version 5.0..


        Parameters:
        env - Environment handle as obtained by calling the createEnvironment API. This is required for the user exit to raise errors and access environment information.
        inXML - See YFSExtnSupplierExportInputInfoStruct.

        Returns:
        output Item or consignee-specific supplier export information. See YFSExtnSupplierExportOutputInfoStruct.

        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException - This exception is thrown whenever any system errors that the application cannot handle are encountered and the transaction is aborted and changes are rolled back.
